title: Did Lunchbox’s Youngest Kid Say His First Word? + Bobby's Instagram Mistake + Bobby Shuts Down Pregnancy Rumor
itunes:title: Did Lunchbox’s Youngest Kid Say His First Word? + Bobby's Instagram Mistake + Bobby Shuts Down Pregnancy Rumor
description:
Lunchbox brings us some audio of his youngest son and wants us to determine if he said his first word or not. Bobby talks about a major mishap that happened on his Instagram yesterday. Plus, Bobby reacts to a comment his friend made about the reason he might be getting married so quickly!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
